title: Hakeem Beedar | Linguistics, Noam Chomsky & Artificial Intelligence
description:
Join me in a lovely conversation with a colleague, deep thinker and friend Hakeem Beedar. 

Hakeem Beedar holds a bachelor of languages in Linguistics and Japanese at the University of Adelaide. Currently studying a Master of Speech Pathology at Flinders University in his final year.

Thanks for Listening and/or watching. 

-Lewis
